title: BUSINESS PARTNER IDENTIFIER
description: A Business Partner can be stored in different SYSTEMS and can have in these SYSTEMS different internal and external identifiers.

createdDate.title: createdDate
createdDate.description: Date of Entry for ID Number i.e. the date when the entry has been created.

id.title: identifier
id.description: Internal or External (alternative) Identifier of the Business Partner.

idTypeCode.title: identifierType.code
idTypeCode.description: The Code is the unique identifier of the data record for BUSINESS PARTNER IDENTIFIER TYPE.

idTypeName.title: identifierType.term
idTypeName.description: Term is a human readable designator of the data record for this object.

startDate.title: startDate
startDate.description: The Start Date indicates by when the Business Partner Identifier becomes valid.

endDate.title: endDate
endDate.description: The End Date indicates by when the Business Partner Identifier loses its validity.

countryIso2Code.title: country.alpha-2Code
countryIso2Code.description: The Alpha-2 code according to ISO 3166-1

countrySubdivisionIsoCode.title: countrySubdivision.isoCode
countrySubdivisionIsoCode.description:
The Code according to ISO 3166-2.
If a COUNTRY SUBDIVISION is defined for a level not provided by ISO, then this Code remains empty (0). Instead an Alternate National Code has to be provided.

idOwner.title: hinIdOwner
idOwner.description:
This field contains the owner of the identifier.
If the BUSINESS PARTNER IDENTIFIER TYPE is "HIN" (healthcare industry number) then it contains the owning organization of the "HIN ID".
